title: Iran Policy, Fed Minutes & Bank CEO's Testify
itunes:title: Iran Policy, Fed Minutes & Bank CEO's Testify
description:
Kevin spoke with Brian Hook, United States Special Representative for Iran and a senior advisor to Secretary of State Mike Pompeo, Nick Wadhams, Bloomberg News State Department Reporter, and Hagar Hajjar Chemali, CEO of Greenwich Media Strategies and former Treasury spokesperson for Terrorism and Financial Intelligence. They discussed Bank CEO's of being challenged by the House committee, Fed Minutes and Iran policy.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
